resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: 𐌉𐌕𐌀 𐌕𐌌𐌉𐌀 𐌉𐌂𐌀𐌂 𐌇𐌄𐌓𐌀𐌌𐌀𐌑𐌅𐌀 𐌅𐌀𐌕𐌉𐌄𐌙𐌄 𐌖𐌍𐌉𐌀𐌋𐌀𐌔𐌕𐌓𐌄𐌔 𐌈𐌄𐌌𐌉𐌀𐌔𐌀 𐌌𐌄𐌙 𐌈𐌖𐌕𐌀 Transcription:Ita tmia icac heramašva vatieχe Unial-Astres, θemiasa meχ θuta Possible translation:This temple and these idols are dedicated to Uni-Astre, built by the clanspeople
resource.chars:
𐌉𐌕𐌀 𐌕𐌌𐌉𐌀 𐌉𐌂𐌀𐌂 𐌇𐌄𐌓𐌀𐌌𐌀𐌑𐌅𐌀 𐌅𐌀𐌕𐌉𐌄𐌙𐌄 𐌖𐌍𐌉𐌀𐌋𐌀𐌔𐌕𐌓𐌄𐌔 𐌈𐌄𐌌𐌉𐌀𐌔𐌀 𐌌𐌄𐌙 𐌈𐌖𐌕𐌀

 

Transcription:

Ita tmia icac heramašva vatieχe Unial-Astres, θemiasa meχ θuta

 

Possible translation:

This temple and these idols are dedicated to Uni-Astre, built by the clanspeople

resource.chars:
𐌈𐌄𐌚𐌀𐌓𐌉𐌄𐌉 𐌅𐌄𐌋𐌉𐌀𐌍𐌀𐌔 𐌔𐌀𐌋 𐌂𐌋𐌖𐌅𐌄𐌍𐌉𐌀𐌔 𐌕𐌖𐌓𐌖𐌂𐌄

 

Transcription:

Θefariei Velianas sal cluvenias turuce

 

Possible translation:

Tiberius Velianas the pleasing aedicula has given

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: 𐌌𐌖𐌍𐌉𐌔𐌕𐌀𐌔 𐌈𐌖𐌅𐌀𐌔 𐌕𐌀𐌌𐌄𐌓𐌄𐌔𐌂𐌀 𐌉𐌋𐌀𐌂𐌅𐌄 𐌕𐌖𐌋𐌄𐌓𐌀𐌔𐌄 Transcription:Munistas θuvas tameresca ilacve tulerase Possible translation:That burial of his own by these priests with idols was encircled
resource.chars:
𐌌𐌖𐌍𐌉𐌔𐌕𐌀𐌔 𐌈𐌖𐌅𐌀𐌔 𐌕𐌀𐌌𐌄𐌓𐌄𐌔𐌂𐌀 𐌉𐌋𐌀𐌂𐌅𐌄 𐌕𐌖𐌋𐌄𐌓𐌀𐌔𐌄

 

Transcription:

Munistas θuvas tameresca ilacve tulerase

 

Possible translation:

That burial of his own by these priests with idols was encircled

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: 𐌍𐌀𐌂 𐌂𐌉 𐌀𐌅𐌉𐌋 𐌙𐌖𐌓𐌅𐌀𐌓 𐌕𐌄𐌑𐌉𐌀𐌌𐌄𐌉𐌕𐌀𐌋𐌄 𐌉𐌋𐌀𐌂𐌅𐌄 𐌀𐌋𐌑𐌀𐌔𐌄 Transcription:Nac ci avil χurvar, tešiameitale, ilacve alšase Possible translation:For three years [in the month of] Churvar, with Her burnt offerings, with idols [it was] buried
resource.chars:
𐌍𐌀𐌂 𐌂𐌉 𐌀𐌅𐌉𐌋 𐌙𐌖𐌓𐌅𐌀𐌓 𐌕𐌄𐌑𐌉𐌀𐌌𐌄𐌉𐌕𐌀𐌋𐌄 𐌉𐌋𐌀𐌂𐌅𐌄 𐌀𐌋𐌑𐌀𐌔𐌄

 

Transcription:

Nac ci avil χurvar, tešiameitale, ilacve alšase

 

Possible translation:

For three years [in the month of] Churvar, with Her burnt offerings, with idols [it was] buried

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: 𐌍𐌀𐌂 𐌀𐌕𐌓𐌀𐌍𐌄𐌔 𐌆𐌉𐌋𐌀𐌂𐌀𐌋 𐌔𐌄𐌋𐌄𐌉𐌕𐌀𐌋𐌀 𐌀𐌂𐌍𐌀𐌑𐌅𐌄𐌓𐌔 Transcription:Nac atranes zilacal, seleitala acnašvers Possible translation:During the reign of the chief, in Her hand [he] would be brought forth (ie: Uni-Astre gave him authority to rule)
resource.chars:
𐌍𐌀𐌂 𐌀𐌕𐌓𐌀𐌍𐌄𐌔 𐌆𐌉𐌋𐌀𐌂𐌀𐌋 𐌔𐌄𐌋𐌄𐌉𐌕𐌀𐌋𐌀 𐌀𐌂𐌍𐌀𐌑𐌅𐌄𐌓𐌔

 

Transcription:

Nac atranes zilacal, seleitala acnašvers

 

Possible translation:

During the reign of the chief, in Her hand [he] would be brought forth (ie: Uni-Astre gave him authority to rule)

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: 𐌉𐌕𐌀𐌍𐌉𐌌 𐌇𐌄𐌓𐌀𐌌𐌅𐌄 𐌀𐌅𐌉𐌋 𐌄𐌍𐌉𐌀𐌂𐌀 𐌐𐌖𐌋𐌖𐌌𐌙𐌅𐌀 Transcription:Itanim heramve, avil eniaca pulumχva Possible translation:And with these idols, the year(s) shall endure as the stars
resource.chars:
𐌉𐌕𐌀𐌍𐌉𐌌 𐌇𐌄𐌓𐌀𐌌𐌅𐌄 𐌀𐌅𐌉𐌋 𐌄𐌍𐌉𐌀𐌂𐌀 𐌐𐌖𐌋𐌖𐌌𐌙𐌅𐌀

 

Transcription:

Itanim heramve, avil eniaca pulumχva

 

Possible translation:

And with these idols, the year(s) shall endure as the stars
